name: Da V.inc
description:
This game is a school project lasted 4 weeks which the prompt given was "Leonardo Da Vinci"

When we started thinking for a pitch, we thought “what if Leonardo was living in the present days?”, so we started to develop some ideas on how he would be living.

Connecting engineering in a italian context, we could imagine he would be working for the italian company “olivetti”.

We linked this idea with the fictional company “Aperture Laboratories” in the Portal and Portal 2 games to bring their laboratory/office art style and the puzzles, making the game centered around boolean logic puzzles and a little bit of level exploration.

Credits

Gabriele "Kitzu" Ellena - Game and Level Designer
